project.description:
This task sets up the myproxy-server as a Certificate Authority using SimpleCA.
Accepted options:
MYPROXY_CA_PASS (optional) changeit MYPROXY_CA_DIR (optional) /var/lib/globus/simple_ca MYPROXY_EXTRA_DIR (optional) /opt/myproxy-extra
Flow:
- create root CA with SimpleCA - change hostcert ownership to myproxy user - make sure myproxy-certificate-mapapp is available - modify myproxy-server config files
